alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 1:38PM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts at the highest elevations. Wind gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Grand Canyon, North Rim, Pinetop-Lakeside, Shonto, Show Low, Valle, Whiteriver, and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 8 AM Friday: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 3 to 5 inches North Rim 4 to 8 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Shonto 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Valle 2 to 4 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; White Mountains
